div.h1: Building Citizens & Scholars Brick by Brick

div.p: PAVE Schools prepares Kindergarten to 8th Grade students to thrive in competitive high schools and four-year colleges.
We provide our students with a rigorous academic program and community built on the core values of PERSEVERANCE, ACHIEVEMENT, VIBRANCE and EXCELLENT CHARACTER (PAVE).

video.source: Your browser does not support the video tag.

a.h4: Coronavirus Update: PAVE Academy Red Hook Shifting to Remote Learning March 16th – April 20th

div.p: Update: Wednesday, 3/18: Families can find updated information and Remote Learning Resources HERE. Update: Monday, 3/16: PAVE’s building will remain closed until at least April 20th. Families please check your email for more information. Friday, March 13th PAVE Academy Red Hook (Brooklyn) announced today that it will close for a minimum of one week, until […]

a.h4: PAVE Scholar Prepares for Freshman Year at Stuyvesant High School

div.p: This year, only 33 Hispanic students got into Stuyvesant, New York’s most selective public high school, out of 895 spots. PAVE’s Mary Aragon is one of them. Why do you want to go to Stuyvesant? When I was researching different high schools, I saw how well the students at Stuyvesant did. 97% of students go to college. […]

li.h4: Remote Learning @ PAVE During COVID-19 (Coronavirus) Closure

div.p: Remote learning information and resources for both PAVE Academy Red Hook (NY) and PAVE Southeast Raleigh (NC) students can be found by clicking here.

li.h4: Virtual Spirit Week @ PAVE Red Hook Elementary School!

div.p: PAVE Red Hook Elementary scholars are encouraged to participate in our very first Virtual Spirit Week! Families, please click here for more details on how your scholars can participate!
